00045 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00046 {
00047     so3_parameters_t parameters = {};
00048     int L, N, L0;
00049     complex double *flmn_orig, *flmn_syn;
00050     complex double *f;
00051     double *f_real;
00052     int seed;
00053     clock_t time_start, time_end;
00054     int i, sampling_scheme, n_order, storage_mode, n_mode, real, routine;
00055     int flmn_size;
00056 
00057     const char *n_order_str[SO3_N_ORDER_SIZE];
00058     const char *storage_mode_str[SO3_STORAGE_SIZE];
00059     const char *n_mode_str[SO3_N_MODE_SIZE];
00060     const char *reality_str[2];
00061     const char *routine_str[2];
00062     const char *sampling_str[2];
00063 
00064     n_order_str[SO3_N_ORDER_ZERO_FIRST] = "n = 0 first";
00065     n_order_str[SO3_N_ORDER_NEGATIVE_FIRST] = "n = -N+1 first";
00066 
00067     storage_mode_str[SO3_STORAGE_PADDED] = "padded storage";
00068     storage_mode_str[SO3_STORAGE_COMPACT] = "compact storage";
00069 
00070     n_mode_str[SO3_N_MODE_ALL] = "all n";
00071     n_mode_str[SO3_N_MODE_EVEN] = "only even n";
00072     n_mode_str[SO3_N_MODE_ODD] = "only odd n";
00073     n_mode_str[SO3_N_MODE_MAXIMUM] = "only |n| = N-1";
00074     n_mode_str[SO3_N_MODE_L] = "only |n| = el";
00075 
00076     reality_str[0] = "complex";
00077     reality_str[1] = "real";
00078 
00079     routine_str[0] = "using SSHT";
00080     routine_str[1] = "not using SSHT";
00081 
00082     sampling_str[0] = "MW";
00083     sampling_str[1] = "MWSS";
00084 
00085     // one element for each combination of sampling scheme, storage mode, n-mode and
00086     // real or complex signal.
00087     double errors[SO3_SAMPLING_SIZE][SO3_N_MODE_SIZE][SO3_STORAGE_SIZE][SO3_N_MODE_SIZE][2][2];
00088     double durations_forward[SO3_SAMPLING_SIZE][SO3_N_MODE_SIZE][SO3_STORAGE_SIZE][SO3_N_MODE_SIZE][2][2];
00089     double durations_inverse[SO3_SAMPLING_SIZE][SO3_N_MODE_SIZE][SO3_STORAGE_SIZE][SO3_N_MODE_SIZE][2][2];
00090 
00091     //fftw_init_threads();
00092     //int nthreads = omp_get_max_threads();
00093     //printf("Using %d threads.\n", nthreads);
00094     //fftw_plan_with_nthreads(nthreads);
00095 
00096     // Parse command line arguments
00097     L = N = 4;
00098     L0 = 0;
00099     seed = 1;
00100     if (argc > 1)
00101     {
00102         L = atoi(argv[1]);
00103         if (argc > 2)
00104             N = atoi(argv[2]);
00105         else
00106             N = L;
00107     }
00108 
00109     if (argc > 3)
00110         L0 = atoi(argv[3]);
00111 
00112     if (argc > 4)
00113         seed = atoi(argv[4]);
00114 
00115     parameters.L0 = L0;
00116     parameters.L = L;
00117     parameters.N = N;
00118     parameters.verbosity = 0;
00119 
00120     // (2*N-1)*L*L is the largest number of flmn ever needed. For more
00121     // compact storage modes, only part of the memory will be used.
00122     flmn_orig = malloc((2*N-1)*L*L * sizeof *flmn_orig);
00123     SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(flmn_orig);
00124     flmn_syn = malloc((2*N-1)*L*L * sizeof *flmn_syn);
00125     SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(flmn_syn);
00126 
00127     // We only need (2*L) * (L+1) * (2*N-1) samples for MW symmetric sampling.
00128     // For the usual MW sampling, only part of the memory will be used.
00129     f = malloc((2*L)*(L+1)*(2*N-1) * sizeof *f);
00130     SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f);
00131     f_real = malloc((2*L)*(L+1)*(2*N-1) * sizeof *f_real);
00132     SO3_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_real);
00133 
00134     // Write program name.
00135     printf("\n");
00136     printf("SO3 test program (C implementation)\n");
00137     printf("================================================================\n");
00138 
00139     // routine == 0 --> use SSHT
00140     // routine == 1 --> don't use SSHT
00141     for (routine = 1; routine < 2; ++routine)
00142     {
00143         // real == 0 --> complex signal
00144         // real == 1 --> real signal
00145 
00146         for (real = 0; real < 2; ++real)
00147         {
00148             parameters.reality = real;
00149 
00150             // MWSS not yet supported by direct routines
00151             for (sampling_scheme = 0; sampling_scheme < SO3_SAMPLING_SIZE - routine; ++sampling_scheme)
00152             {
00153                 parameters.sampling_scheme = sampling_scheme;
00154 
00155                 // For real signals, the n_order does not matter, so skip the second option
00156                 // in that case.
00157                 for (n_order = 0; n_order < SO3_N_ORDER_SIZE - real; ++n_order)
00158                 {
00159                     parameters.n_order = n_order;
00160 
00161                     for (storage_mode = 0; storage_mode < SO3_STORAGE_SIZE; ++storage_mode)
00162                     {
00163                         parameters.storage = storage_mode;
00164 
00165                         for (n_mode = 0; n_mode < SO3_N_MODE_SIZE; ++ n_mode)
00166                         {
00167                             parameters.n_mode = n_mode;
00168 
00169                             durations_inverse[sampling_scheme][n_order][storage_mode][n_mode][real][routine] = 0.0;
00170                             durations_forward[sampling_scheme][n_order][storage_mode][n_mode][real][routine] = 0.0;
00171                             errors[sampling_scheme][n_order][storage_mode][n_mode][real][routine] = 0.0;
00172 
00173                             printf("Routines %s: testing a %s signal with %s sampling using %s with %s. N-Mode: %s. Running %d times: ",
00174                                        routine_str[routine],
00175                                        reality_str[real],
00176                                        sampling_str[sampling_scheme],
00177                                        storage_mode_str[storage_mode],
00178                                        n_order_str[n_order],
00179                                        n_mode_str[n_mode],
00180                                        NREPEAT);
00181 
00182                             for (i = 0; i <NREPEAT; ++i)
00183                             {
00184                                 int j;
00185                                 double duration;
00186 
00187                                 // Reset output array
00188                                 for (j = 0; j < (2*N-1)*L*L; ++j)
00189                                     flmn_syn[j] = 0.0;
00190 
00191                                 if (real) so3_test_gen_flmn_real(flmn_orig, &parameters, seed);
00192                                 else      so3_test_gen_flmn_complex(flmn_orig, &parameters, seed);
00193 
00194                                 time_start = clock();
00195                                 if (routine)
00196                                     if (real) so3_core_inverse_direct_real(f_real, flmn_orig, &parameters);
00197                                     else      so3_core_inverse_direct(f, flmn_orig, &parameters);
00198                                 else
00199                                     if (real) so3_core_inverse_via_ssht_real(f_real, flmn_orig, &parameters);
00200                                     else      so3_core_inverse_via_ssht(f, flmn_orig, &parameters);
00201                                 time_end = clock();
00202 
00203                                 duration = (time_end - time_start) / (double)CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00204                                 if (!i || duration < durations_inverse[sampling_scheme][n_order][storage_mode][n_mode][real][routine])
00205                                     durations_inverse[sampling_scheme][n_order][storage_mode][n_mode][real][routine] = duration;
00206 
00207                                 time_start = clock();
00208                                 if (routine)
00209                                     if (real) so3_core_forward_direct_real(flmn_syn, f_real, &parameters);
00210                                     else      so3_core_forward_direct(flmn_syn, f, &parameters);
00211                                 else
00212                                     if (real) so3_core_forward_via_ssht_real(flmn_syn, f_real, &parameters);
00213                                     else      so3_core_forward_via_ssht(flmn_syn, f, &parameters);
00214                                 time_end = clock();
00215 
00216                                 duration = (time_end - time_start) / (double)CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00217                                 if (!i || duration < durations_forward[sampling_scheme][n_order][storage_mode][n_mode][real][routine])
00218                                     durations_forward[sampling_scheme][n_order][storage_mode][n_mode][real][routine] = duration;
00219 
00220                                 flmn_size = so3_sampling_flmn_size(&parameters);
00221                                 errors[sampling_scheme][n_order][storage_mode][n_mode][real][routine] += get_max_error(flmn_orig, flmn_syn, flmn_size)/NREPEAT;
00222 
00223                                 printf(".");
00224                             }
00225                             printf("\n");
00226                         }
00227                     }
00228                 }
00229             }
00230         }
00231     }
00232 
00233     free(flmn_orig);
00234     free(flmn_syn);
00235     free(f);
00236     free(f_real);
00237 
00238     // =========================================================================
00239     // Summarise results
00240 
00241     printf("================================================================\n");
00242     printf("Summary\n\n");
00243     printf("Runs   = %40d\n", NREPEAT);
00244     printf("L0     = %40d\n", L0);
00245     printf("L      = %40d\n", L);
00246     printf("N      = %40d\n\n", N);
00247 
00248 
00249     // routine == 0 --> use SSHT
00250     // routine == 1 --> don't use SSHT
00251     for (routine = 1; routine < 2; ++routine)
00252     {
00253         printf("Results for routines %s...\n", routine_str[routine]);
00254         // real == 0 --> complex signal
00255         // real == 1 --> real signal
00256 
00257         for (real = 0; real < 2; ++real)
00258         {
00259             printf("  ...with %s signals...\n", reality_str[real]);
00260 
00261             // MWSS not yet supported by direct routines
00262             for (sampling_scheme = 0; sampling_scheme < SO3_SAMPLING_SIZE - routine; ++sampling_scheme)
00263             {
00264                 printf("    ...using %s sampling...\n", sampling_str[sampling_scheme]);
00265 
00266                 for (storage_mode = 0; storage_mode < SO3_STORAGE_SIZE; ++storage_mode)
00267                 {
00268                     printf("      ...with %s...\n", storage_mode_str[storage_mode]);
00269 
00270                     // For real signals, the n_order does not matter, so skip the second option
00271                     // in that case.
00272                     for (n_order = 0; n_order < SO3_N_ORDER_SIZE - real; ++n_order)
00273                     {
00274                         printf("        ...using %s...\n", n_order_str[n_order]);
00275 
00276                         for (n_mode = 0; n_mode < SO3_N_MODE_SIZE; ++ n_mode)
00277                         {
00278                             printf("          ...and %s...\n", n_mode_str[n_mode]);
00279                             printf("            Minimum time for forward transform: %fs\n", durations_forward[sampling_scheme][n_order][storage_mode][n_mode][real][routine]);
00280                             printf("            Minimum time for inverse transform: %fs\n", durations_inverse[sampling_scheme][n_order][storage_mode][n_mode][real][routine]);
00281                             printf("            Average max errors for round-trip:  %e\n", errors[sampling_scheme][n_order][storage_mode][n_mode][real][routine]);
00282                         }
00283                     }
00284                     printf("\n");
00285                 }
00286             }
00287         }
00288     }
00289 
00290     return 0;
00291 }
00292 
00293 double get_max_error(complex double *expected, complex double *actual, int n)
00294 {
00295     int i;
00296     double error, maxError = 0;
00297 
00298     for (i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00299     {
00300         error = cabs(expected[i] - actual[i]);
00301         maxError = MAX(error, maxError);
00302     }
00303 
00304     return maxError;
00305 }
00306 
00323 void so3_test_gen_flmn_complex(
00324     complex double *flmn,
00325     const so3_parameters_t *parameters,
00326     int seed)
00327 {
00328     int L0, L, N;
00329     int i, el, m, n, n_start, n_stop, n_inc, ind;
00330 
00331     L0 = parameters->L0;
00332     L = parameters->L;
00333     N = parameters->N;
00334 
00335     for (i = 0; i < (2*N-1)*L*L; ++i)
00336         flmn[i] = 0.0;
00337 
00338     switch (parameters->n_mode)
00339     {
00340     case SO3_N_MODE_ALL:
00341     case SO3_N_MODE_L:
00342         n_start = -N+1;
00343         n_stop  =  N-1;
00344         n_inc = 1;
00345         break;
00346     case SO3_N_MODE_EVEN:
00347         n_start = ((N-1) % 2 == 0) ? -N+1 : -N+2;
00348         n_stop  = ((N-1) % 2 == 0) ?  N-1 :  N-2;
00349         n_inc = 2;
00350         break;
00351     case SO3_N_MODE_ODD:
00352         n_start = ((N-1) % 2 != 0) ? -N+1 : -N+2;
00353         n_stop  = ((N-1) % 2 != 0) ?  N-1 :  N-2;
00354         n_inc = 2;
00355         break;
00356     case SO3_N_MODE_MAXIMUM:
00357         n_start = -N+1;
00358         n_stop  =  N-1;
00359         if (N > 1)
00360             n_inc = 2*N - 2;
00361         else
00362             n_inc = 1;
00363         break;
00364     default:
00365         SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid n-mode.");
00366     }
00367 
00368     for (n = n_start; n <= n_stop; n += n_inc)
00369     {
00370         for (el = MAX(L0, abs(n)); el < L; ++el)
00371         {
00372             if (parameters->n_mode == SO3_N_MODE_L && el != abs(n))
00373                 break;
00374 
00375             for (m = -el; m <= el; ++m)
00376             {
00377                 so3_sampling_elmn2ind(&ind, el, m, n, parameters);
00378                 flmn[ind] = (2.0*ran2_dp(seed) - 1.0) + I * (2.0*ran2_dp(seed) - 1.0);
00379             }
00380         }
00381     }
00382 }
00383 
00403 void so3_test_gen_flmn_real(
00404     complex double *flmn,
00405     const so3_parameters_t *parameters,
00406     int seed)
00407 {
00408     int L0, L, N;
00409     int i, el, m, n, n_start, n_stop, n_inc, ind;
00410     double real, imag;
00411 
00412     L0 = parameters->L0;
00413     L = parameters->L;
00414     N = parameters->N;
00415 
00416     for (i = 0; i < (2*N-1)*L*L; ++i)
00417         flmn[i] = 0.0;
00418 
00419     switch (parameters->n_mode)
00420     {
00421     case SO3_N_MODE_ALL:
00422     case SO3_N_MODE_L:
00423         n_start = 0;
00424         n_stop  = N-1;
00425         n_inc = 1;
00426         break;
00427     case SO3_N_MODE_EVEN:
00428         n_start = 0;
00429         n_stop  = ((N-1) % 2 == 0) ?  N-1 :  N-2;
00430         n_inc = 2;
00431         break;
00432     case SO3_N_MODE_ODD:
00433         n_start = 1;
00434         n_stop  = ((N-1) % 2 != 0) ?  N-1 :  N-2;
00435         n_inc = 2;
00436         break;
00437     case SO3_N_MODE_MAXIMUM:
00438         n_start = N-1;
00439         n_stop  = N-1;
00440         n_inc = 1;
00441         break;
00442     default:
00443         SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid n-mode.");
00444     }
00445 
00446     for (n = n_start; n <= n_stop; n += n_inc)
00447     {
00448         if (n == 0)
00449         {
00450             // Fill fl00 with random real values
00451             for (el = L0; el < L; ++el)
00452             {
00453                 if (parameters->n_mode == SO3_N_MODE_L && el != 0)
00454                     break;
00455 
00456                 so3_sampling_elmn2ind_real(&ind, el, 0, 0, parameters);
00457                 flmn[ind] = (2.0*ran2_dp(seed) - 1.0);
00458             }
00459 
00460             // Fill fl+-m0 with conjugated random values
00461 
00462             for (el = L0; el < L; ++el)
00463             {
00464                 if (parameters->n_mode == SO3_N_MODE_L && el != 0)
00465                     break;
00466 
00467                 for (m = 1; m <= el; ++m)
00468                 {
00469                     real = (2.0*ran2_dp(seed) - 1.0);
00470                     imag = (2.0*ran2_dp(seed) - 1.0);
00471                     so3_sampling_elmn2ind_real(&ind, el, m, 0, parameters);
00472                     flmn[ind] = real + imag * I;
00473                     so3_sampling_elmn2ind_real(&ind, el, -m, 0, parameters);
00474                     flmn[ind] = real - imag * I;
00475                     if (m % 2)
00476                         flmn[ind] = - real + imag * I;
00477                     else
00478                         flmn[ind] = real - imag * I;
00479                 }
00480             }
00481         }
00482         else
00483         {
00484             for (el = MAX(L0, n); el < L; ++el)
00485             {
00486                 if (parameters->n_mode == SO3_N_MODE_L && el != n)
00487                     break;
00488 
00489                 for (m = -el; m <= el; ++m)
00490                 {
00491 
00492                     so3_sampling_elmn2ind_real(&ind, el, m, n, parameters);
00493                     flmn[ind] = (2.0*ran2_dp(seed) - 1.0) + I * (2.0*ran2_dp(seed) - 1.0);
00494                 }
00495             }
00496         }
00497     }
00498 }
00499 
00513 double ran2_dp(int idum)
00514 {
00515     int IM1=2147483563,IM2=2147483399,IMM1=IM1-1,
00516         IA1=40014,IA2=40692,IQ1=53668,IQ2=52774,IR1=12211,IR2=3791,
00517         NTAB=32,NDIV=1+IMM1/NTAB;
00518 
00519     double AM=1./IM1,EPS=1.2e-7,RNMX=1.-EPS;
00520     int j,k;
00521     static int iv[32],iy,idum2 = 123456789;
00522     // N.B. in C static variables are initialised to 0 by default.
00523 
00524     if (idum <= 0) {
00525         idum= (-idum>1 ? -idum : 1); // max(-idum,1);
00526         idum2=idum;
00527         for(j=NTAB+8;j>=1;j--) {
00528             k=idum/IQ1;
00529             idum=IA1*(idum-k*IQ1)-k*IR1;
00530             if (idum < 0) idum=idum+IM1;
00531             if (j < NTAB) iv[j-1]=idum;
00532         }
00533         iy=iv[0];
00534     }
00535     k=idum/IQ1;
00536     idum=IA1*(idum-k*IQ1)-k*IR1;
00537     if (idum < 0) idum=idum+IM1;
00538     k=idum2/IQ2;
00539     idum2=IA2*(idum2-k*IQ2)-k*IR2;
00540     if (idum2 < 0) idum2=idum2+IM2;
00541     j=1+iy/NDIV;
00542     iy=iv[j-1]-idum2;
00543     iv[j-1]=idum;
00544     if(iy < 1)iy=iy+IMM1;
00545     return (AM*iy < RNMX ? AM*iy : RNMX); // min(AM*iy,RNMX);
00546 }
